state: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, you could, like, make an effort to head west. After that, head north. Following that, make an effort to take a trip east. Then, move north. After that, go to the west. And then, make an effort to move north. After that, head north. And then, attempt to venture east. Then, head south. Following that, attempt to move east. Then, make an attempt to take a trip south. After that, try to head south. And then, go to the south. With that over with, retrieve the shadfly from the floor of the laundromat. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Kitchenette =- Well, here we are in the kitchenette. A locked freezer is here. You can make out a fridge. The fridge is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever! You can make out a chair. The chair is usual. The chair appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well You make out a rack. The rack appears to be empty. Hopefully, this discovery doesn't ruin your TextWorld experience! There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Kitchenette =-0/1
next_state: -= Shower =- This might come as a shock to you, but you've just come into a shower. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Shower =-0/2
